Name: Empire Chronicles
About the game: Main Features - Sprawling and Large World. - Epic storyline and Narrative. - Complex Stats & Combat. - Massive Skill Trees With Hundreds Of Skills. - 100+ hours in the main story - New, unique, and strategic battle system - Deep and emotional main story - Loads of side quests and secrets to discover - 17 main playable characters each with character arcs. - Tons of equipment to build your team for a wide variety of enemies Sub Features - Craft all assortments of weapons, trinkets, armor, edibles and furniture. - Hone skills & spend perk points. - Timing events, day night cycle, and weather patterns. - Multiple Difficulties: With greater risk & reward.
